jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
An alien creature screeches at Moses as he searches through the car, a couple of seconds later it leaps at his face
The alien suddenly attacks one of the policemen as he closes the van doors, a few seconds later it pounces on the other policeman
The alien appears by the door to the van
The alien lunges at the windscreen
The alien attacks Hi Hatz’ henchman as he turns around
There is a loud bang on the door
Moses looks through the peephole in the door a second time and the alien suddenly lunges at the door
The alien smashes in the recycling bin that Biggz is hiding in
The alien lunges at Biggz as he peers out of the recycling bin
The alien bangs on the lift
An alien knocks over Jerome
Jerome grabs Pest’s ankle
As Spoon begins to tell a joke a dead cow is thrown into the campfire startling the soldiers. [Video]
Captain Ryan pops up beside Corporal Campbell and screams
A silhouette moves past the camera
Corporal Campbell attempts to flee the area but runs into, and is impaled by, a tree trunk
A werewolf roars and Campbell is slashed across the face
Sarge crouches down and a werewolf passes by in the trees above him
A werewolf hand comes through the roof of the truck
A dog jumps out at Coop
A werewolf tries to break through the door
A werewolf is spotted outside
The window blind behind Terry suddenly closes, a couple of seconds later a werewolf grabs him and pulls him though the window
Coop sees a corpse hanging from a rope
A werewolf suddenly punches Coop
A snake slithers out of the rabbit cage
A hand reaches out and grabs Chris
The motorcycle gang member gets stabbed by a pitchfork
Chuck suddenly bumps into Debbie
A bag falls from the ceiling
A hanging corpse falls from the tree
A corpse is thrown through the window
A loud noise is heard behind him and something briefly flies by the camera
A girl appears laying behind him
The girl turns around to face him
The camera moves to a corpse and the corpse moves its eye
Camera cuts to a dead body
The lights go off and the man sees a dead person appear in front of him
The girl turns the lights off and several dead appear
A hand reaches out from the floor and grabs him
Jang Kyung-chul breaks the window of the car
Jang Kyung-chul leaps from the left and tackles Jang Se-yun
Ani suddenly shoots Kate
A beaver swims past Walt
Walt suddenly surfaces in front of the boat
Kelly and Hank’s boat flips over
Hank moves a branch to reveal Hector standing behind it
The crocodile jumps out of the water and bites off a man’s head
Hank is pulled into the air by a trap
Kelly stands on a branch and a decomposing head flies out at her
The crocodile jumps up and grabs the helicopter
The crocodile surfaces beside the helicopter
The crocodile appears in front of Hank
The crocodile surfaces once more beside the helicopter
The crocodile grabs Hector
There are three quick cuts to The Reaper ferociously cutting a pot plant accompanied by heavy metal music
Towers smashes the television screen with his golf club
A zombie snatches away the plate that Morgan holds out
Several of the infected start attacking Morgan’s car
One of the apparently dead soldiers suddenly jumps up and bites a man
A silhouette passes by in the foreground
An infected person jumps out at Colonel Knox
One of the lab workers looks through a window in the door and an infected person suddenly appears right in front of her
A flock of birds fly out at Billy as he sees several flayed corpses hanging in the trees
Dillon almost runs into Mac
Blood splatters on Blaine’s shoulder
The Predator is suddenly caught in the net just as Dutch begins to turn back
Mac puts his hand over Dillon’s mouth
The Predator shoots a laser at Poncho from the trees
The Predator traps Dutch’s head between two spikes that come out of its arm
A young boy lying motionless on the ground suddenly jumps up and attacks a man
A bloodied hand appears on a window
Alice starts to drink from a pond when a mutant suddenly jumps out of it and attacks her
A monster breaks out from underneath some rubble
The creature pierces the roof of the truck that Alice is driving
After colliding with Alice’s car, the creature suddenly roars at Alice
There is a loud noise as Alice bangs into a metallic object
Alice is startled by a printer kicking into life
The red queen says “behind you” and Alice turns around to see a mutant running at her
An armed man pops up as Alice approaches the Umbrella Corporation motorbike
A zombie runs at Chu
A zombie rushes at Alice as she enters Dr. Isaacs’ tank
Alice shoots a flaming zombie
One of the dogs suddenly attacks Christian
Claire yells out to Alice who turns around as a zombie attacks her
The lights start to switch back on
The blades of the fan start to spin as Claire and Abigail go through it
A man falls through a trap door
A mutant rushes past the screen
Razor drops down behind Alice
One of the chained up corpses suddenly lunges at Razor as he walks past it
The mutant attacks Razor
The mutant gets up and runs away
Alice walks into a chain
The mutant drops down from the ceiling
The apparently dead creature gets up and attacks once more
Doc puts his hand on Alice’s shoulder
There is a loud (although not unexpected) explosion
A zombie attacks Dr. Isaacs
David attacks the security guard in the parking lot
Michael screams in horror as the brothers drop into the fog from the train bridge
The family dog attacks Michael when he enters the bathroom to kill Sam
Thor the dog lunges at Lucy
Edgar plunges a wooden spike through Marko’s heart
Paul leaps out from behind the bathroom door
Max turns around revealing he is a vampire
Grandpa drives his jeep into the house killing Max with a large wooden spike
One of the surfers shows its fangs and begins to screech
Nicole suddenly gets in front of Chris at a very fast speed and grabs him by the throat
As a camera shows an empty room through a window, Nicole appears from the side at extreme speed
While running, Evan bumps into one of the vampires
The barn door swings open
There is a sudden flash of light revealing one of the vampires reaching out to grab Evan
One of the vampires facing away from the camera quickly turns its head to reveal that it’s fully shifted into its true form
There is a sudden screech and Chris is dragged out of screen
A lightbulb suddenly explodes
Aunt Jillian suddenly swings the door open
An explosion in the sand scares rick
As Evy is searching where a sound comes from a skeleton pops up with a very loud sound effect (but it turns out to be a joke from Jonathan)
Rick throws a bag on the table scaring Evy
When Evy comes up from picking her brush, Hook from the Medjai is suddenly behind her
When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes
A hand pops out of the ground
Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him
When Rick decapitates a mummy, the mummy holds his head and Rick then slams the sword to the head causing the mummy´s head to fly towards the screen
Anck Su Namun pops up behind Rick and Evy
Evy runs into Anck Su Namuns
During the opening title screen, we see a quote from the Egyptian Prayer of Resurrection, this fades out and a few seconds later there is a loud noise and what appears to be sparks appear on screen
Some earth falls on Jenny, Nick, and Vail
Nick shoots Vail a third time
After the plane crash we see several plastic body bags lying in a morgue when one of them (Nick) suddenly sits up
Nick looks around while sitting on the morgue table and sees the ghost of Vail behind him
Some birds screech and fly away as a man shines a torch on the mummy sarcophagus
Ahmanet suddenly attacks the rescue worker
The second rescue worker is attacked by Ahmanet
Nick sees several rats near some rubbish and suddenly a mummified hand appears in the foreground
Ahmanet tackles a man to the ground and kisses him (turning him into a corpse)
Nick is tackled as he walks into a hallway
A mummy breaks through the ambulance window and tries to grab Nick
A mummy smashes into the windscreen
Vail appears beside Nick on the bus
A mummified hand bursts out of a tomb
One of Ahmanet’s minions attacks Nick and Jenny
A man wearing a purge mask jumps out in front of a woman walking down the street
A man appears right beside the ambulance window which startles Laney
A close up of several men being suddenly shot in the head may startle some viewers
An apparently dead man lying on a car jumps up and attacks Leo
There is gunfire from outside the ambulance
The ambulance is shot at by a helicopter
A truck slams into the ambulance
An unseen person pulls Roan out of the ambulance
Leo stabs a man in the back
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
As Norah points her flashlight in front of her, the camera scrolls to reveal a dead body right in her face
While Smith and Paul investigate the back of a dead body, something suddenly jumps out from inside the body right at the camera
Emily pokes the creature, which causes it to suddenly get up and shriek
During a quiet scene, something hits the outside of the building, making a loud noise
Paul puts his ear on a wall, followed by a loud noise that startles him
There is another banging sound that startles the crew
Something hits the outside of the building again
As the crew point a flashlight to a window in the ceiling, a bunch of tentacles suddenly smash against it
Norah points her lights in front of her, which reveals a creature who swims at the camera
One of the creatures swims right in front of Norah
One of the creatures suddenly appears behind Norah as the captain shines his light on her
As the captain looks in front of him, one of the creatures swims towards the camera
Norah shines the light on a creature that suddenly attempts to grab her
The leg of one the creatures drops down in front of Norah
Norah is suddenly grabbed in the face by one of the creatures and dragged upwards
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
A personal trainer zombie attacks the glass
Body parts fall from the fire escape and land on a dumpster
A pack of zombies, led by R, bust through the pharmacy lab doors
Zombie dad makes a run and lunges at Perry before being shot dead
The skeleton eaters jump and claw at the door as R and Julie escape
M runs over three skeleton eaters with a luggage cart
Julie’s dad pulls a gun on R
A dead body/zombie jumps on Julie
A police officer is shot through the back of a car while driving. Although telegraphed, the impact is rather sudden
While a man is driving, there is a sudden cut to Katarina on the road accompanied by a sound cue
A seemingly dead woman suddenly springs back up from behind Paul and screeches
